item.title: A Fistful of Death
item.description: A Fistful of Death is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Demofilo Fidani and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Drummer of Vengeance
item.description: Drummer of Vengeance is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Mario Gariazzo and starring Ty Hardin, Rossano Brazzi and Craig Hill.

item.title: John the Bastard
item.description: John the Bastard is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Armando Crispino and starring John Richardson.

item.title: Dead Men Don't Make Shadows
item.description: Dead Men Don't Make Shadows, aka Stranger That Kneels Beside the Shadow of a Corpse is a 1970 spaghetti western directed by Demofilo Fidani.

item.title: Trusting Is Good... Shooting Is Better
item.description: Trusting Is Good... Shooting Is Better is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Osvaldo Civirani.

item.title: A Barrel Full of Dollars
item.description: A Barrel Full of Dollars also known as Coffin Full of Dollars is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Demofilo Fidani and starring Jack Betts.

item.title: Sartana the Gravedigger
item.description: I am Sartana, Your Angel of Death is a 1969 Italian Western film directed by Giuliano Carnimeo and starring Gianni Garko. The film is presented on some DVD reissues under its German title, Sartana - Töten war sein täglich Brot.

item.title: Savage Guns
item.description: Savage Guns is a low-budget spaghetti western from 1971, directed by Demofilo Fidani and starring Robert Woods.

item.title: My Name Is Shanghai Joe
item.description: The Fighting Fist of Shanghai Joe is a 1973 Spaghetti Western kung fu film directed by Mario Caiano and starring Chen Lee as Shanghai Joe. The film was released in a number of alternate titles in the United States, including To Kill or to Die and The Dragon Strikes Back.

item.title: Beyond the Law
item.description: Beyond the Law is a 1968 Spaghetti Western film directed by Giorgio Stegani and starring Lee Van Cleef as Cudlip, Antonio Sabàto Sr. as Ben Novack and Gordon Mitchell as Burton. It was first distributed in the United States in 1971.
